import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Bike.css' export const Bike = () => { const [bike, SetBike] = useState( { bikename: '', bikenumber: '', bikemodel: '', bikebrand: '', bikeyear: '', bikecolor: '', price:'', biketype: '', bikecondition: '', quantity: '', description: '', image:null } ) const[message,setmessage]=useState(''); const handleChange = (event) => { const { name, value ,type, files} = event.target; if(type==='file'){ SetBike({ ...bike, [name]: files[0] }); }else{ SetBike({ ...bike, [name]: value }) } } const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); console.log(bike); setmessage("SuccessFully Upload...!"); setTimeout(() => { setmessage(''); }, 2000); SetBike( { bikename: '', bikenumber: '', bikemodel: '', bikebrand: '', price:'', bikeyear: '', bikecolor: '', biketype: '', bikecondition: '', quantity: '', description: '', image:null, } ) } return (

Bike Information

{message && (
{message}
)}
